articles.title: The One Way History Shows Trump's Personality Cult Will End - POLITICO
articles.description: An expert on autocracy assesses how far America has slipped away from democracy, and what it will take to get it back.
articles.content:
Kruse: Is it fair to see DeSantis as a very capable, committed student, whereas Trump is more of an instinctual autocrat?
Ben-Ghiat: There are limits to the comparison because Trump truly is an auto… [+9553 chars]
